name: draw.io
details:
[draw.io](https://www.draw.io) is a free diagramming Power-up that enables you to draw a wide range of diagrams including flowcharts, BPMN, network diagrams, UML and ER diagrams, and much more. draw.io offers these advantages:

* Fully open source platform.
* All data stored inside Trello, nothing externally.
* Import diagrams from other diagramming tools.

### Screenshot

![Screenshot of a draw.io diagram insertion in Trello card.](https://www.draw.io/connect/trello/images/drawio-trello-ss.png)
author: draw.io
